quiz

Class Quizz

  • java.lang.Object
    • quiz.Quizz

  • public class Quizz
extends java.lang.Object
    This class builds a quizz, administers it and gives user a grade

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static void administerQuiz()
      Asks the user each of the ten quiz questions and gets the user's answers.
      private static void createQuiz()
      Creates the array of objects that holds the quiz questions Substraction or addition is a random choice
      private static void gradeQuiz()
      Shows all the questions, with their correct answers, and computes a grade for the quiz.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • createQuiz

        private static void createQuiz()
        Creates the array of objects that holds the quiz questions Substraction or addition is a random choice

      • administerQuiz

        private static void administerQuiz()
        Asks the user each of the ten quiz questions and gets the user's answers. The answers are stored in an array, which is created in this subroutine.

      • gradeQuiz

        private static void gradeQuiz()
        Shows all the questions, with their correct answers, and computes a grade for the quiz. For each question, the user is told whether they got it right.
